start: ^Oh good morning, little brother. Ready for school?
step2: ^I'm sorry to hear that. Are you okay?
^Is there a way to get rid of stress?
ending: ^I'm sorry but no. You can't get rid of your stress.
^Stress is part of our daily lives. We cannot avoid it. We will always be stressed one way or another.
^But you I'm confident you can handle your stress. You can do it!
^Anyways, you should go to school now before you are late.
^When you leave the house, just keep walking right. You should get there on time.
